strategy: Bad Moons armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 3+.
usage: An Ork player can choose to double or triple the number of units in the formation if he wishes. A formation with double the normal number of units is called a big formation, and a formation with three times the normal number of units is called a ’Uge formation.

An Ork formation may include any of the extra units listed in the Extras column. You may include any number of extra units in a formation unless it is specifically noted otherwise. If there is a limitation then the limit is doubled for a big formation and tripled for a ’uge formation. For example, a normal sized Kult of Speed can include 0–1 Oddboy, a big Kult of Speed can include 0–2, and a ’uge Kult of Speed can include 0–3.

formations.name: Bad Moons Warband
formations.units: Two Nobz, five Boyz, three Grotz
extraUnits: Add any number of Gorkanauts/Morkanauts: 75 points each
Add any number of Stompas/Megadreads: 50 points each
Add any number of 'ardwagons': 50 points each
Add any number of Dreadnoughts, Flakwagons, Gunwagons: 35 points each
0-2 Nobz: 35 points Each
Add any number of Big Gunz, Boyz + (optional) Grotz, Killa Kans: 25 points each
Upgrade any number of Nobz to Meganobz: 15 points each
